post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Job Profile
Advertisement number: 222582
Title: Web designer (junior & freelance) (NOC: 2175)  
Terms of Employment: Temporary, Part Time, Weekend, Evening
Salary: To be negotiated
Anticipated Start Date: As soon as possible  
Location: Toronto North, Ontario (1 vacancy)
Skill Requirements:  
  Education: Completion of college/CEGEP/vocational or technical training, Other: Should have graphic design background. Exp. with FrontPage
Credentials (certificates, licences, memberships, courses, etc.): Other: College diploma
Experience: 0 - 6 months
Languages: Speak English, Read English, Write English
Operating Systems: MS Windows 95/98/NT/2000
Applications: Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, MS FrontPage
Other Information: Experience with FLASH is a plus. Salary range from $12 to $18/hr

Employer: Wedding Occasion.com

How to Apply:  By E-mail: raymondn@accessv.com

Business Profile: Web hosting company
Advertised until: 2003/02/07


This job advertisement has been provided by an employer external to HRDC. HRDC is not responsible for the accuracy, the currency and the reliability of the content.
post.title: Web designer (junior & freelance)
